creator: nickytd@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 30524
patch in WsWebSocketContainer

There is case sensitive check for ws protocol header name in WsWebSocketContainer
Here is a fix and a test case checking subprotocol negotiation

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
Thanks for the report and the patch.

I used a slightly different solution based on the fact that the client always stores headers with lower case names.
